page.title: 08Sport in Hungerford.
page.content: Hungerford boasts several sporting clubs including Soccer, Cricket, Tennis, Squash, Bowls, Badminton and Swimming. In a survey we conducted over half of those who replied were satisfied with the sports facilities offered, although several would like a purpose built Sports Centre.Hungerford residents prefer taking part to watching.Of those surveyed 66% said they did take part in some sporting activity but only 33% said they watched sport taking place in the town. The Hungerford Town Football Club is the largest attracting crowds of a few hundred. The team is in the Premier division of the Isthmian League. The small clubs thrive too.Three years ago the Bowls Club built themselves a new pavilion.At present there are 60 members,including 20 ladies.
